data.title: Netsuite Implementation - BORN Group
data.meta_description: We are a key alliance partner across all the major verticals and has a global practice that advocates, deploys, and supports the marketplace.
data.meta_site_name: BORN Group | Combining creative, content, and commerce to drive change. Imagine, build, and run human-centered brand experiences.
data.text:
NetSuite is the world’s leading provider of cloud-based business management software and helps companies manage core business processes with a single, fully integrated system covering enterprise resource planning (ERP) and financials, customer relationship management (CRM), eCommerce, inventory, and more.

In 1998, NetSuite pioneered the Cloud Computing revolution, establishing the worldâs first company dedicated to delivering business applications over the Internet. Today, NetSuite provides a suite of cloud-based financials, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), and omnichannel commerce software that runs the business of more than 21,000 customers in more than 200 countries and territories.

BORN is a key alliance partner across all the major verticals and has a global practice that advocates, deploys, and supports the marketplace, with a track record of over 30+ global customers and brands across the ERP, CRM, HCM, and Project/Resource Management functional domains.
